# Ashwheel - Free Online Tools Platform

> A comprehensive suite of free online tools for PDF manipulation, image editing, financial calculations, and productivity enhancement.

## About

Ashwheel is a free online platform offering 40+ powerful tools designed to simplify daily tasks. From PDF editing to image conversion, financial calculators to productivity utilities - all tools are completely free, require no registration, and work directly in your browser.

## Main Categories

### PDF Tools
- PDF Editor - Edit, annotate, and sign PDF documents
- Split PDF - Divide PDFs into single pages or ranges
- Merge PDF - Combine multiple PDFs into one
- Compress PDF - Reduce file size without quality loss
- PDF to JPEG - Convert PDF pages to images
- PDF to Text - Extract text from PDFs
- JPEG to PDF - Convert images to PDF
- Word to PDF - Convert DOCX to PDF

### Image Tools
- CanvasCraft - Design custom layouts with photos and PDFs
- Crop Anything - Crop images and PDFs freely
- Image Compressor - Optimize images for web
- Image Resizer - Resize to custom dimensions
- JPEG to PNG - Convert with transparency support
- PNG to JPEG - Convert with background options
- Passport Photo Maker - Create official passport photos
- Aadhaar Formatter - Format e-Aadhaar for printing

### Productivity & Utility Tools
- Password Generator - Generate secure passwords
- Unit Converter - Convert measurement units
- Color Picker & Palette - Pick colors and create palettes
- Text Case Converter - Convert text cases
- BMI Calculator - Calculate Body Mass Index
- JSON Formatter - Format and validate JSON
- Pomodoro Timer - Focus timer for productivity
- Text Summarizer - Summarize long texts
- Habit Tracker - Track daily habits
- Poll Maker - Create instant polls

### Video & Content Tools
- Thumbnail Downloader - Download YouTube thumbnails
- Word Counter - Count words, characters, sentences

### Generators & Calculators
- QR Code Generator - Create custom QR codes
- Magic QR Generator - All links in one QR code
- GST Calculator - Calculate Indian GST
- EMI Calculator - Calculate loan EMIs
- SIP Calculator - Calculate mutual fund returns
- Taxable Amount Calculator - Reverse GST calculation
- Age Calculator - Calculate exact age
- Date Difference - Calculate days between dates

### Web & Other Tools
- URL Shortener - Create short links
- Invoice Generator - Generate PDF invoices
- Resume Builder - Build professional resumes
- Marriage Biodata Maker - Create marriage biodata

## Premium Software

**Ashwheel Pro** - Complete management software for automobile dealerships, showrooms, and workshops. Features include stock management, sales tracking, job cards, invoicing, and comprehensive analytics.

## Key Features

- **100% Free** - All tools are completely free to use
- **No Registration** - Use tools instantly without signing up
- **Privacy First** - All processing happens in your browser
- **No Watermarks** - Download clean files without branding
- **Unlimited Usage** - No limits on file size or usage
- **Mobile Friendly** - Works on all devices
- **Fast & Secure** - Browser-based processing for speed and security
- **No Downloads** - No software installation required

## Technology Stack

- React 18 with Vite
- TailwindCSS for styling
- Supabase for backend (Pro version)
- PDF.js for PDF manipulation
- Sharp for image processing
- Progressive Web App (PWA) enabled

## Target Audience

- Students and educators
- Small business owners
- Freelancers and contractors
- Content creators
- Designers and developers
- Financial planners
- General users needing quick online tools

## Contact

- Website: https://ashwheel.com
- Email: support@ashwheel.com
- Social Media: @ash_mzp

## License

All tools are provided free for personal and commercial use. Ashwheel Pro is a commercial product with separate licensing.
